channel_count.definition: The number of input channels of the DAQ-device.

description.definition: A description of this hardware item.

dio_line_count.definition: The number of digital input/output lines (DIO) of the device.

inventory_no.definition: The inventory number of the device.

manufacturer.definition: The Manufacturer of this hardware item.

model.definition: The model name of this hardware item.

owner.definition: Who's the owner of the device.

polarity.definition: The polarity of the measurement "unipolar" or "bipolar".

reference.definition: The reference to which voltages were measured. Usually either "common ground" or "differential".

resolution.definition: The voltage resolution of the analog input (AIN) subsystem given in bit.

sample_rate.definition: The sample rate with which an individual input channel was sampled. Given in Hz.

used_channel_count.definition: The number of used analog input channels.
